pullRequest.title: [CALCITE-3719] Add hint option checker to customize the option
pullRequest.bodyText:
validation

Add interface HintOptionChecker to let user validate each hint's
options
Add customizable hint error handler

nodes.bodyText: new HashMap<>() -> Collections.emptyMap() may be better? I think EMPTY  here implicate that it's an immutable object.

nodes.bodyText:
Why is this change?
The issue is it makes log4j APIs accessible in the testing code, so the wrong Logger class appears in the auto-complete :(
